description.value: You can choose and describe an additional genre of music and associated non-Perception class skill to gain an insight bonus with when listening to it through your personal soundtrack or let’s jam alternate class features. If you select a second genre of music and skill, the bonus for your first genre’s skill increases by 1, and its penalty to Perception increases by 1. If you select a third genre, your first genre’s skill again increases its bonus by 1 and penalty by 1, as does your second genre’s skill. If you select a fourth genre, the bonuses and penalties for all three of your previous genre skills increase by 1, (to a maximum of +5 and –4, respectively).
